description: Enjoy a seasonal twist on this Moscow Mule recipe. Mixed with homemade pumpkin butter and fresh rosemary, this is the perfect cocktail to serve at your holiday parties all season long.
name: Pumpkin Moscow Mule
recipeIngredient: 12 oz. ginger kombucha or ginger beer

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the vodka, pumpkin butter, cayenne, and one sprig of rosemary along with 3-4 cubes of ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake well to ensure the pumpkin butter gets well blended.
Place 2-3 ice cubes in the bottom of two Moscow Mule mugs. Pour the vodka/pumpkin mixture through the strainer, evenly dividing between the two mugs. Top with kombucha or ginger beer.
Serve immediately with a sprig of fresh rosemary.
